dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 1810 IH: To revise the boundaries of John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System Gasparilla Island Unit in Florida.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Radel introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To revise the boundaries of John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System Gasparilla Island Unit in Florida.

section.header: John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System Gasparilla Island Unit, Florida

subsection.text: The map subtitled Gasparilla Island Unit FL–70P included in the set of maps entitled Coastal Barrier Resources System referred to in section 4(a) of the Coastal Barrier Resources Act (16 U.S.C. 3503(a)) and relating to the Gasparilla Island Unit in Florida is hereby replaced by another map relating to the same unit entitled John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System Corrected Gasparilla Unit FL–70/FL–70P, draft dated May 23, 2012.

The Secretary of the Interior shall keep the replacement map referred to in subsection (a) on file and available for inspection in accordance with section 4(b) of the Coastal Barrier Resources Act (16 U.S.C. 3503(b)).
